questList.questDescription: Embark on a quest to defeat the formidable Mortisar, the Eternal Necromancer, who commands the Shadows of Dusk in Twilight Meadows.
Unleash your courage and confront Wraithshade, the Spectral Haunter haunting the Twilight Meadows, in a battle to banish its malevolent presence.
Challenge the mighty Glacialcoil, the Frostscale Serpent reigning over the Frostbite Peaks, and emerge victorious to claim the icy terrain.
Silence the powerful Tundra Shaman, Stonechant, whose elemental magic threatens the peace of Frostbite Peaks.
Venture into the depths of the Crimson Caverns and defeat the dreaded Blightspawn, a Putrid Fiend spreading chaos within the infernal legion.
Conquer the Shadowflame Wyrm, Necrobyss, ruling the Crimson Caverns with dark draconic power, to restore balance to the fiery depths.
